docs.text: These are the specifications developed by the  Local Waste Service Standards Project .
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text:
Event


Use cases and requirements


The Event model should have properties for:


event type




What kind of event it is.




date created




1 Jan 2015




UPRN




For recording against specific properties.




USRN




For recording street-level information.




coordinates




For easy geolocation of where the event was recorded.




image




Visual evidence of an issue.




comments




For any additional information useful to record.




Properties








Term


Mapping


Description










event type


string


A categorisation of the event.






date created


string


Timestamp.






uprn


string


A unique identifier for a property.






usrn


string


A unique identifier for a street.






geo


GeoCoordinates


The location in WGS84 datum.






image


URL


A URL to an related image.
docs.title: Event

docs.text: The Event model should have properties for:  event type   What kind of event it is.   date created   1 Jan 2015   UPRN   For recording against specific properties.   USRN   For recording street-level information.   coordinates   For easy geolocation of where the event was recorded.   image   Visual evidence of an issue.   comments   For any additional information useful to record.

docs.text:
Missed collection reasons





  
ID

  
Name

  
Description






  
1

  
Not presented

  
The container is not presented at the curbside.






  
2

  
Contaminated

  
The contents of the container is contaminated with waste not suitable for that collection.






  
3

  
Too heavy

  
The container contents is too heavy for safe collection.
docs.title: Missed collections

docs.text:
ID 
   Name 
   Description   
   1 
   Not presented 
   The container is not presented at the curbside.   
   2 
   Contaminated 
   The contents of the container is contaminated with waste not suitable for that collection.   
   3 
   Too heavy 
   The container contents is too heavy for safe collection.
